subject: p13263843
Findings: Frontal and lateral views of the chest were obtained. The patient is status post right upper chest wall resection, right upper lobectomy with right apical scarring and upward traction of the right hilum from radiation fibrosis, all unchanged. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. The left lung is clear. Heart size is normal.
Impression: Interval resolution of right pleural effusion.
